comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: New York Times, 10 March 1915: C.C. Madison, former owner of the Kansas City club of the Federal League, testified before Judge Baldwin in the Circuit Court here today, where owners of this club are seeking to enjoin the transfer of its franchise to Newark, N.J. He was cross-examined by Edward E. Gates, attorney for the league, which is defendant in the suit. The Federal League baseball team was the Kansas City Packers.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
trialsanderrors:

Thanks for the background information on Mr. Madison. We will expand the description when we update.
